about.title: About This Template
about.description: A minimal but production-ready monorepo template for full-stack TypeScript applications. Designed to be cloned and extended for new projects, with a focus on developer experience and best practices.
about.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Next Project?
about.ctaDescription: This template provides everything you need to build a modern web application: authentication, database integration, API structure, and a beautiful UI.
about.featuresDescription: Everything you need to build a production-ready application, with a focus on developer experience and best practices.
